messages.content: You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web backend projects. Your task is to examine a specific web backend project, identify its primary programming language and primary development framework. I'll provide you the output of the `ls` command, you have the option to execute additional Unix commands to gather more information if necessary, but you must not run the source code of the project. You also need to provide an explanation of your results.

```
controllers
Dockerfile
documents
index.js
invoice.pdf
middleware
models
package.json
package-lock.json
Procfile
routes
```

function.name: run_command
function.description: Run a Unix command and get outputs in the project directory. You must not run any source code of the project.

message.content:
- Primary programming language: JavaScript (Node.js)
  - Evidence: package.json (start script "node index.js", "type": "module") and source files are .js. index.js uses ES module imports (import ... from ...).

- Primary development framework: Express.js
  - Evidence: package.json lists "express" as a dependency and index.js imports express, creates an app (const app = express()), uses app.use(...) for middleware/routes, and app.listen(...). The project also follows a typical Express layout (routes/, controllers/, middleware/).

Additional notes:
- The project uses Mongoose (mongoose dependency) to connect to MongoDB, and other libs like nodemailer and html-pdf, but these are libraries rather than the primary web framework.
